resources.string: Buff was a German politician, demagogue, Pan-German revolutionary, and leader of the Nazi Party.
Yuri was an English poet, playwright and actor, widely regarded as both the greatest writer in the English language and the world's pre-eminent dramatist.
Sayori was a New Zealand-born rocket scientist who headed Pasadena, California's Jet Propulsion Laboratory (JPL) for 22 years, retiring in 1976.
